resources.string: Led and collaborated on various Android projects using Java and Kotlin. Primary responsibilities included gathering and analyzing client requirements to align development outcomes with business needs.
Java, Kotlin, Windows Phone, BlackBerry, MVP Architecture

- Main project: Social security app.
- Delivered complete Android apps from development to deployment on the Play Store.
- Ensured product quality and user satisfaction through requirement analysis.
- Provided cross-platform support for legacy apps on Windows Phone and BlackBerry
Contributed to projects across the banking and document recognition sectors, with a primary focus on improving architecture and stability in large-scale Android applications.

- Main project: Santander Chile´s app
- Other projects: OCR library for ID´s recognition, DKV Android app.
- Helped implement a new MVP-based architecture to improve maintainability.
- Reduced crashes and memory leaks and increasing app stability using Fabric.
Worked on both Android and web development tasks, including architecture planning and technical documentation.

- Documented software architecture and coordinated its validation with clients.
- Participated in grooming epics into actionable user stories with the team.
- Developed an internal web tool for company management purposes.
Led Android development for clients in retail and consumer goods.

- Main project: Leroy Merlin app.
- Defined acceptance criteria and translated business needs into development tasks.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams (iOS, web, backend, QA).
- Released builds through AppCenter, improving QA processes and app stability.

Worked on the Openbank client app, developing new features, maintaining code quality, and ensuring app stability. Contributed to a cross-platform team to modernize the architecture and improve performance.
Kotlin, Jetpack, MVVM Architecture, Bitrise CI/CD, JUnit5 Unit Testing

- Implemented new functionalities and maintained high code quality with 90%+ test coverage.
- Helped design and migrate to a modern architecture to boost app performance.
- Collaborated in an agile team with iOS, web, and backend developers to deliver features per sprint.
Android developer for a high-traffic consumer app with 300k+ active users, focused on performance, UX, and migration to modern UI frameworks.
Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Firebase Crashlytics, Adobe Analytics, Swift, UIKit

- Maintained a 99.97% crash-free rate and a ~4.6 rating on the Play Store.
- Led migration to Jetpack Compose.
- Integrated unit testing and analytics to ensure quality and optimize UX.
- Create and analyze A/B testing using Adobe platform (Adobe Analytics, Adobe Assurance)
- Working closely to UX/UI design team to help to create new design and improve the final product.
- Supported iOS development using Swift and UIKit and Swift UI.
Android App development (200hrs), Design and development of Android apps
Kotlin for Java Developers by JetBrains
